mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.zbbm zbbm, t.zbmc zbmc, t.ssdz ssdz, t.ssdzmc ssdzmc, t.xzqh xzqh, t.zblx zblx, t.sccj sccj, t.zcbl zcbl, t.kysl kysl, t.zzsl zzsl, t.shsl shsl, t.ztsl ztsl, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , dz.DZJC dzmc, c2.code_name xzqhmc, c4.code_name zblxmc FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t
Left Join YAGL_XFDZ dz On dz.DZID = t.SSDZ And dz.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'XZQH' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c2.CODEID = c1.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.XZQH = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'ZBQCLX' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c4.CODEID = c3.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.ZBLX = c4.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
AND rownum <= 91772 ORDER BY ssdz,zbmc ASC
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS uuid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX(uuid,zbbm,zbmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqh,zblx,sccj,zcbl,kysl,zzsl,shsl,ztsl,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zblx,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zcbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{kysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{shsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{ztsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_WL_XFZBXX(uuid,zbbm,zbmc,ssdz,ssdzmc,xzqh,zblx,sccj,zcbl,kysl,zzsl,shsl,ztsl,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.zbbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbbm,#{item.zbmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zbmc,#{item.ssdz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdz,#{item.ssdzmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ssdzmc,#{item.xzqh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xzqh,#{item.zblx,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zblx,#{item.sccj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sccj,#{item.zcbl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zcbl,#{item.kysl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} kysl,#{item.zzsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} zzsl,#{item.shsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} shsl,#{item.ztsl,jdbcType=DOUBLE} ztsl,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), zbbm = VALUES(zbbm), zbmc = VALUES(zbmc), ssdz = VALUES(ssdz), ssdzmc = VALUES(ssdzmc), xzqh = VALUES(xzqh), zblx = VALUES(zblx), sccj = VALUES(sccj), zcbl = VALUES(zcbl), kysl = VALUES(kysl), zzsl = VALUES(zzsl), shsl = VALUES(shsl), ztsl = VALUES(ztsl), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_WL_XFZBXX t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
